# Government Tender Announcement

## Title and Context
**Title (English)**: Snow Removal, Sanding and Cleaning of the Parkway and Secondary Roads – La Mauricie National Park
**Title (French)**: Déneigement, sablage et nettoyage de la route Promenade et des chemins secondaires – Parc National de la Mauricie

## Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: cb-8037-42107169
* **Solicitation Number**: 5P300-23-0050/A
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-09-06T14:00:00
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

## Description of Work
Parks Canada is seeking a contractor to provide snow removal, sanding, and cleaning services for several sectors of the La Mauricie National Park. The successful contractor will be required to provide labor, equipment, and materials to complete the work in accordance with the Statement of Work.

## Timeline
The contract is expected to run from 2023-10-15 to 2025-06-30, with three (3) additional one-year periods.

## Submission Requirements
* Bids must be submitted via email or fax.
* Bids received in person or by courier will not be accepted.
* The only acceptable email address for responses to the bid solicitation is soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca.
* The only acceptable facsimile for responses to bid solicitations is 1-877-558-2349.

## Enquiries
All enquiries of a technical and contractual nature should be submitted to the Contracting Authority, in writing, at least 5 calendar days prior to the tender closing date.

## Additional Information
* National Parks Regulations require that all work be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
